summary: Part of the Strategic Solutions team, working with partners like GovTech on projects using JS tech stack (React, Node, Tailwind, Sequelize, MySql, TS)
Worked on process and Tooling development. Worked on development of new ink supplies products. 6 months attachment to Oregon, USA for knowledge transfer and training.
Worked as the mechanical design engineer on the flagship product, a PCB board printer. Developed multiple designs using 3D CAD and sourced for parts for manufacturing.
